title: How to make the new League Client run on discrete graphics card? (I use a laptop)
body:
With the new client enabled and with its new visuals and all sorts of stuff, it surely became 'laggy' even with the Low Spec Mode enabled. It is currently running on my onboard Intel Graphics and I wish to use my discrete graphics card (which is a Nvidia GTX 850M) which I think can solve the problem a bit because in-game I get over a hundred fps on max settings.

I tried tracking the league client executable in the task manager to add it to the Nvidia settings to run on discrete graphics, but still after doing that it won't switch to it.
